Articles.Content:
Ok so I'm looking into finally doing a single stage to laythe and back SSTO and I have a few quick questions

1. How much delta-v do I need? I think I have a few craft capable of making the trip but I want to make sure first!

2. What was that trick for making it so that both turbojets flame out at the same time that was floating around a while back? Just want to know this for another interesting design I have in mind!

Thanks for your time!

Edited February 25, 2015 by DerpenWolf

Number 2, it's to place the intakes that will feed an engine, then the engine, and repeat that process. Rather than placing all the engines then all the intakes.

Or there's a mod that will do that for you after the fact so you don't have to worry about it so much. But the mod can be a bit weird if your plane is complicated.

1. A lot!. Check out this dV chart for more info. though, roughly you will need, at a minimum 6520, but you're better off packing about 8km/s, but this only accounts for 4.5km/s to LKO. It also assumes you aerobrake into Laythe landing.
